about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Developer passionate about creating innovative solutions
about.intro: I work as a Full Stack Developer at Meta, building dynamic user interfaces and efficient back-end services for a comprehensive system that manages hotel networks.
about.description: I use React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to enhance the system's functionality and operational efficiency, working closely with the team to understand business needs and deliver solutions that meet or exceed client expectations.
about.passion: I'm passionate about software development. I'm always eager to learn new things and improve my skills as a developer.
